info.name: Fogbugz Almost Blue
info.description:
WHAT DIS?
Eye saver theme for fogbugz, sans wiki.
This is not finished and janky A-F. 

WHY DIS?
White was killing my eyeballnuts.

WHERE DIS?
Works on your fogbugz.


Description stolen from JuanBobo.
info.additionalInfo:
Small update to fix when someone copys a bug and pastes it in a new issue causing FB to insert a load of inline styles.
I did some wiki stuff, but not much. Next rel :o
